Yoeri van Bruchem

Data Nerd

Hi! Nice to meet you!
My name is Yoeri van Bruchem. Thank you for checking out my portfolio website. Currently, I am working on this site and its content. I'm planning to publish my first articles starting January 2021. Please come back by then or contact me at yoeriv@nbruchem.nl
